import React from 'react' import axios from "axios"; export default function Form(props) { const { values, update, submit, form } = props const onChange = e => { const name = e.target.name const value = e.target.value update(name, value) } const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const newUser = { name: form.name.trim(), email: form.email, password: form.password, }; submit() axios .post } return (
) }
